thread.title: Broadcom ups Qualcomm bid in "final offer"

title: Broadcom ups Qualcomm bid in "final offer"
text:
Broadcom ups Qualcomm bid in "final offer" 5:21pm GMT - 01:17 
Chipmaker Broadcom Lts has sweetened its bid to buy Qualcomm Inc for more than $121 billion, ratcheting up pressure on its rival to come to the table for negotiations in its ''best and final offer''. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Chipmaker Broadcom Lts has sweetened its bid to buy Qualcomm Inc for more than $121 billion, ratcheting up pressure on its rival to come to the table for negotiations in its "best and final offer".
